Headline: #151 Sheridan & #156 LaSalle Temporary Reroute near Belmont/Sheridan-Broadway
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan & 156 LaSalle buses temp. rerouted NB: Sheridan, Belmont, Addison & Halsted; SB Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan & #156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Belmont/Sheridan-Broadway.

Northbound buses will operate via Sheridan, Belmont, Addison and Halsted.

Southbound buses will operate via Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Harlem (O'Hare Branch).

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Harlem (O'Hare Branch).

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Westbound Reroute near 55th/Princeton
ShortDescription: Westbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Wells. 59th, Halsted and 55th, due to street blockage near 55th/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Wells. 59th, Halsted and 55th, due to street blockage near 55th/Princeton.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
